p: Sun et al. [ 95] studied the effect of PHA content on hydroxypropyl distarch phosphate (HPDSP)/PHA films via film blowing. They found that the film crystallinity increased on increasing the PHA content, attaining the highest light transmittance and tensile strength at 12% PHA content, while the water vapor permeability, the elastic modulus, and the thermal resistance decreased upon increasing the PHA wt%.
